name: Sparki
author: Johannes Sanders

sections.description:
Sparki is a communication platform for real estate agents to reduce/remove the need to talk to prospects. Customers can directly schedule inbound appointments for house visits or intakes without involvement from you.

It’s a self-checkout for potential leads to schedule a house visit without talking to anyone. Visitors can visit your website, select the apartment they want to see and schedule an appointment.

You, the real estate agent, can set up the available schedule in the Sparki dashboard. Sparki makes sure all the timeslots will be filled automatically. Likewise, Sparki can automatically do all the scheduling and even possible rescheduling. We will keep both parties involved in touch via email.
sections.installation:
Install directly from the WordPress store:
1. Register at https://sparki.app
2. In the WordPress admin, go to Plugins and click Add New
3. Search for “Sparki” click Install Now and then click Activate
4. Navigate to the Sparki configuration page in the WordPress admin main menu bar (just below “Settings”)
5. Use the Connect now button to connect to your account
6. Select the integration you want to use and click Connect
— done —

Manual installation:
1. Register at https://sparki.app
2. Download the Sparki plugin from WordPress
3. Upload the unzipped sparki folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
or 3. in the WordPress admin, navigate to Plugins and Add new and click Upload PLugin select the sparki.zip file and click Install Now
4. Navigate to the Plugins' andInstalled Pluginsmenu in WordPress, find Sparki in the list and clickActivate5. Navigate to theSparki` configuration page in the WordPress admin main menu bar (just below “Settings”)
6. Use the “Connect now” button to connect to your account
— done —

For documentation and tutorials, visit our Knowledge Base.
sections.faq: • Do I need an account at Sparki?: Yes, to set up a schedule and receive incoming messages, you need to set up an account at Sparki.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • feat: initial release for the Sparki plugin

short_description: Use Sparki to manage your communication for open houses without answering your phone. This plugin helps you to connect to Sparki.
description:
Sparki is a communication platform for real estate agents to reduce/remove the need to talk to prospects. Customers can directly schedule inbound appointments for house visits or intakes without involvement from you.

It’s a self-checkout for potential leads to schedule a house visit without talking to anyone. Visitors can visit your website, select the apartment they want to see and schedule an appointment.

You, the real estate agent, can set up the available schedule in the Sparki dashboard. Sparki makes sure all the timeslots will be filled automatically. Likewise, Sparki can automatically do all the scheduling and even possible rescheduling. We will keep both parties involved in touch via email.

screenshots.caption: Add Sparki to let your customers announce appointments.
A self-check where users can select a date and time and specify their details.
Sparki is also a way customers can get in touch with you.
